input_text:
Job Title: Global Sales Analyst Intern

Location: Oklahoma City, OK

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Description

 Description 

Immerse, Explore, and Impact the Universe of Payment Solutions by expressing your interest in the Global Payments 2024 Summer Internship Program. Spanning the course of 10 weeks, from June 3rd - August 9th, this program is available to sophomore-graduate students currently enrolled in a college or university. This internship program will be based in Oklahoma City, OK.

Throughout the program, you will have the opportunity to complete a capstone project, participate in professional development sessions, and receive mentorship. Apply today to the Global Payments Internship program to immerse yourself, explore new horizons, and make a meaningful impact on the future of payment solutions!

Summary

As a Global Sales Analyst Intern for Global Payments, you will work to gather and translate data that has been collected for Global Sales into a repeatable format outlining potential opportunities and propose solutions for the team to deploy.

  What will you be doing?  

 Gather data from internal and external sources  Coordinate with Marketing and Sales teams to identify critical data to capture  Assist in building a data modeling tool, specifically using Excel/Sheets  Work with the Cross Border team to provide additional contextual information  Perform basic statistical analysis and quantitative research  Other responsibilities as assigned 

  Knowledge and Skill Required  

 Rising Sophomore to Graduate student currently enrolled in a college or university  Motivated self-starter, confident, and able to navigate through change  Advanced PC skills with proficiency in Google Workspace preferred, or MS Office including MS Word, Excel, and PowerPoint  Strong communication skills  Strong analytical and problem solving skills 

Experience

 Proven experience working in an office environment is a plus  Strong skills in Microsoft Excel are a plus  Experience identifying data trends or statistics is a plus 

  Education  

 Must be enrolled in a Business program at an accredited university or seeking a career in Finance, Sales Operations, Sales Enablement, or STEM related fields 

  Physical Requirements  

 May sit for long periods of time in front of a computer

Experience Level (if available): Internship
